body: And the raw of the third part just came out yesterday... I came looking to see if it was worth downloading... but like the mahou shoujo who becomes a mahou shoujo to save her boyfriend from a sucubus and ends cheating him, I'll have to download it because I haven't seen it anywhere else.... although I don't quite like the art of this artist for interesting development of the story

Sad part 1 isn't on here. This is such a hot story. Man goes to rural area and meets a little girl who understands him more than his wife does. Naturally, they start fucking. And it's implied at the end that he leaves his family and marries the girl.
